H0.text: Who won the first . Alexander Graham Bell

H1.text: Who won the first . Leonardo da Vinci

H2.text: Who won the first . Isaac Newton

A4.text: Alexander Graham Bell is credited with patenting the first practical telephone.

A5.text: In 1880, Bell received the Volta Prize with a purse of 50,000 French francs for the invention of the telephone from the French government.
